channel.title: Need help (exrendum source)
channel.description:
If someone could make a few commands for me then tell me where i should add them so they will work.
First i want 1 to do ::hail like the normal 1 where they like bow down to you saying hail (persons name)
also i want a command when i say ::bla they say we love playing this server!(something like that)
id appreciate it and if you could also tell me where to add them in like what spot.
Another thing is im using exrendum source and for the bounty hunter i need to know where to go to change the pvp drops in there. Also sometimes u lose stuff so if you could tell me what to change to make sure u dont lose anything.
- thanks marcbob

item.title: Need help (exrendum source)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:2, topic:301696”]add this -

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "all hail lord "+p.playerName+"."; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

to your client.java

then add this to your command string -

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights >= 2) { hail();

but personally it just adds more un needed junk to the client.java creating more lagg.[/quote]

where do i add the first part in client?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (exrendum source)
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

add this -

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "all hail lord "+p.playerName+"."; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

to your client.java

then add this to your command string -

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights >= 2) { hail();

but personally it just adds more un needed junk to the client.java creating more lagg.

Read full topic
